name: AI-driven Exploration of Patient Characteristics in Clinical Trials
description: Scraped the clinicaltrials.gov website, and implemented prompt engineering on OpenAI's GPT-3.5 Turbo via Chat Completion API to identify inclusion and exclusion criteria to assess patient representativeness and safety measures
tech: [Python 3, Selenium, BeautifulSoup4, OpenAI Chat Completion API]

name: A Review on In-Memory Caching Systems: Scalability, Efficiency and Optimizations
description: Exploring Segcache and related in-memory caching systems, focusing on scalability, efficiency, and optimizations in key-value stores like Memcached and Redis

name: The Evolution of Operating Systems: A Comprehensive Review of 19 Milestone Papers
description: Studied OS design, system calls, schedulers, concurrency, memory allocation, file systems, virtualization, and testing

name: Turning Labels into Images: A Pix2Pix Based Facade Generator
description: Implemented the pix2pix GAN model for image-to-image translation, training with L1 and L1 + cGAN loss, along with spectral normalization for stabilization and performance improvement

name: TelePhysio: Telemedicine Platform for Remote Physical Therapy
description: Developed a Java based telemedicine application for remote physical therapy, containerized with Docker and managed on AWS using EC2 instances for hosting, along with RDS for database services
tech: [Java, Spring Framework, Docker, Minikube, MySQL, WebRTC]

name: Pcapture: PCAP Analysis Tool for TCP and HTTP Flows in Networking
description: Built a tool for analysing and assessing the attributes of the TCP & HTTP protocols from PCAP files using the dpkt library

name: DomainHunter: DNS/DNSSEC resolver
description: Developed a DNS resolver from scratch with support for DNSSEC to strengthen the authentication based on public key cryptography using the dnsPython 3 library, along with an in-built dig tool

name: Visualization of Net Benefit CDF vs Cost of Reinsurance
description: Built interactive visualization using Chart.js for users to gain financial insights with PHP and MyMySQL for data retrieval
tech: [HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JSP, Java, PHP, MySQL]

name: EduStack: A Smart e-Learning Platform
description: Engineered a Python 3 full-stack web application, facilitating community-based education exchange via REST APIs
tech: [Python 3, Django, Django REST framework, JavaScript, Node.js, React, MySQL]

name: Vision and Language Navigation using Minimal Voice Instructions
description: Designed a navigation algorithm using YOLOv3 and a graph-based path planning module for the traversal of a virtual agent in a 3D space using the Matterport API
tech: [C++, Python 3, JavaScript, HTML, GCP, Shell scripting]

name: Customized Data Acquisition System for an All-terrain Vehicle
description: Implemented a customized data acquisition system with multiple electric sensors, developed Arduino firmware for signal processing and Zigbee wireless transmission, and created a React.js web-based dashboard for real-time data visualization and analytics validation
